extensionDescription.message: PR Checklistfy is a Chrome extension that streamlines Pull Request reviews. It automatically generates checklists of items to verify during review, preventing oversights in the review process.

githubTokenStorageNotice.message: Your GitHub token is stored locally and only used to access PR data.

createGithubToken.message: Create a new token on GitHub →

githubEnterpriseNotice.message: Use this for GitHub Enterprise instances

analysisLanguageDescription.message: Select the language for AI-generated PR analysis and checklist items.

pleaseEnterValidOpenAIKey.message: Please enter a valid OpenAI API key

invalidApiKeyFormat.message: Invalid API key format. OpenAI API keys typically start with "sk-"

openaiKeyStorageNotice.message: Your OpenAI API key is stored locally and only used to generate PR analysis.

getOpenAIKey.message: Get your API key from OpenAI

pleaseEnterValidOpenAIEndpoint.message: Please enter a valid OpenAI API endpoint

invalidUrlFormat.message: Please enter a valid URL (e.g. https://api.openai.com/v1)

setCustomEndpointNotice.message: Set a custom API endpoint if you are using a self-hosted instance of OpenAI.

pleaseEnterValidGeminiApiKey.message: Please enter a valid Gemini API key

failedToSaveGeminiApiKey.message: Failed to save Gemini API key

failedToClearGeminiApiKey.message: Failed to clear Gemini API key

geminiKeyStorageNotice.message: Your Gemini API key is stored locally and only used by the extension.

aiChecklistNotGenerated.message: AI checklist not generated yet for this file.

askAiPrompt.message: Ask AI a question or provide feedback

allChecklistDone.message: All checklist items are OK. Close the chat to continue.

analyzingPr.message: Analyzing your PR. This may take a moment...

clickGenerateSummary.message: Click 'Generate Summary' to get AI-powered summary about this PR.

noPrDataSaved.message: No PR data currently saved in storage.

prDataSaved.message: You have PR(s) saved in storage.

deletePrDataConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete all saved PR data? This action cannot be undone.

noPrDataFound.message: No PR data found to clear

deletePrDataNotice.message: This will delete all saved PR data, including checklist statuses and AI analysis results.

generatingChecklistError.message: Error occurred while generating the checklist.

enterPrUrlPrompt.message: Enter a GitHub Pull Request URL to generate an AI-powered review checklist.

openaiApiDesc.message: To use PR Checklistify, you need to provide your OpenAI API key.

geminiDesc.message: To use PR Checklistify with Gemini, provide your Gemini API key.
